sources.title: Police_Court
sources.description: Great Depression era tale of a young boy who tries to get his alcoholic father, who was once a famous actor, back into a productive life in the movie business.

sources.title: Police Court  (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Henry B. Walthall, Leon Janney, Lionel Belmore
Director: Louis King

When a once great stage and screen actor falls from fame because of his alcoholism; his young son is determined to see his father "make good" again.

metadata.Plot: A once great stage and screen actor (Henry B. Walthall) has fallen from fame because of his alcoholism; his young son (Leon Janney) is determined to see his father "make good" again.
metadata.Actors: Henry B. Walthall, Leon Janney, Lionel Belmore
